title: Thieves Cause Uproar On Scottish Island That Was Once Crime-Free
teaser: NPR's Melissa Block speaks with Bill Clark, councilor on the remote island of Canna, about the first theft there since the 1960s. The thieves robbed a store operating via the "honesty box" system.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
